√vadh 'slay'

present: vadha?  vadheyam  vadhet  

aorist: [1.] badhyāsam  badhyāsus  vadhyāt  avadhi   -- [5.] ávadhīt etc. V.+  avadhīm  vádhīm  vádhiṣas  badhīs  vadhiṣṭhās  vadhiṣiṣṭa  

future: [1.] vadhiṣyati  vadhiṣyate etc. E.+  

secondary: passive: vadhyate etc. E.+  vadhyati etc. E.+   -- causative: vadhayati etc.  

derivatives: vadhá V.+  badhá V.+  vádhaka AV.+  vádhya AV.+  bádhya AV.+  vadhánā RV.  vádhatra RV.  vádhar RV.  -vadhyā E.+  -vadhra RV.  vádhri? V.+  vadhasná RV.  vadhasnú V.
